name: coursera_scrape_instructor
description: Scrape a Coursera instructor profile page. Returns name, title, institution, bio, courses taught, learner count, and rating.

steps.code: const nameEl = document.querySelector('h1, [class*="instructor-name"], [class*="profile"] h1'); const titleEl = document.querySelector('[class*="title"], [class*="position"], h1 + p'); const institutionEl = document.querySelector('[class*="institution"], [class*="partner"], [class*="university"]'); const bioEl = document.querySelector('[class*="bio"], [class*="about"] p, [class*="description"]'); const avatarEl = document.querySelector('[class*="avatar"] img, [class*="profile"] img, [class*="instructor"] img'); const learnersEl = document.querySelector('[class*="learner"] span, [class*="students"]'); const ratingEl = document.querySelector('[class*="rating"] span'); const coursesCountEl = document.querySelector('[class*="courses"] span, [class*="course-count"]'); const courses = []; const courseEls = document.querySelectorAll('a[href*="/learn/"], a[href*="/specializations/"], [class*="course-card"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(courseEls.length, 10); i++) { const el = courseEls[i]; const courseNameEl = el.querySelector('h3, h2, [class*="title"]'); const courseRatingEl = el.querySelector('[class*="rating"] span'); courses.push({ name: courseNameEl ? courseNameEl.textContent.trim() : el.textContent.trim().substring(0, 100), rating: courseRatingEl ? courseRatingEl.textContent.trim() : '', url: el.href || '' }); } return { name: nameEl ? nameEl.textContent.trim() : '', title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', institution: institutionEl ? institutionEl.textContent.trim() : '', bio: bioEl ? bioEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 500) : '', avatar: avatarEl ? avatarEl.getAttribute('src') : '', learners: learnersEl ? learnersEl.textContent.trim() : '', rating: ratingEl ? ratingEl.textContent.trim() : '', course_count: coursesCountEl ? coursesCountEl.textContent.trim() : '', courses: courses, profile_url: window.location.href }
